title: Exhibit
description: An exhibit for display in Minerva Story

Description.description: A single line of text to render above the image pyramid

Path.description: An absolute or relative URL to the root of an image pyramid

Width.description: The full resolution horizontal width of the image in pixels

Waypoints.description: List of waypoints for the story

height.description: Heigth of the rectangular overlay as a fraction of the full width of image layout at given zoom
